title: Settings

nfc.title: NFC Tags
nfc.instructions_idle: Click "Start Scan" and present the tag to the Boks.
nfc.error_timeout: Scan timed out. Please try again.
nfc.instructions_exists_local: You can register it locally if it's not in the list.

export_instructions: Copy this JSON to backup your configuration.

about.title: About Boks Web BLE
about.description: An open-source web interface for Boks smart parcel boxes.
about.bluetooth_description: This application allows you to control your Boks parcel box via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) directly from your browser.
about.credits_description: This project is the result of a reverse engineering effort to understand and interoperate with the Boks system.
about.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is an unofficial client and is not affiliated with Boks.

developer.clear_db_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the entire database? This cannot be undone.
developer.mock_data_helper: Resets DB and loads test data for 'Mock Boks'.
developer.db_editor_helper: View and inspect local IndexedDB data
developer.mock_data_confirm: This will wipe existing data for the mock device. Continue?
developer.mock_data_success: Mock data loaded successfully. You may need to refresh.
